text: Faramea is a genus of plant in the family Rubiaceae. Species include: * F. angusta C. M. Taylor * F. biflora J. G. Jardim & Zappi * F. capillipes * F. exemplaris Standl. * F. hymenocalyx M. Gomes * F. nocturna J. G. Jardim & Zappi * F. oligantha Müll. Arg. * F. paratiensis M. Gomes * F. picinguabae M. Gomes * F. quadricostata * F. vasquezii C. M. Taylor == References == Category:Rubiaceae genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Faramea
